casebody.data:
CONFERENCE

At Raleigh, June Term, 1801. jyEE curiam

If an indictment for murder describe the wound •* as given in the brest, omitting the lettera, ’tis fatal; and the judgment must be arrested upon a motion in arrest made after verdict. 5 Rep. 121,123, Cowp. 229,, Doug. 1,94, 1 Terra S37, were cited for the state.
